54template <typename Impl>
55class FactoryBase;
56
57enum class NumberCacheMode { kIgnore, kSetOnly, kBoth };
58
59using FixedInt32Array = FixedIntegerArrayBase<int32_t, ByteArray>;
60using FixedUInt32Array = FixedIntegerArrayBase<uint32_t, ByteArray>;
61
62// Putting Torque-generated definitions in a superclass allows to shadow them
63// easily when they shouldn't be used and to reference them when they happen to
64// have the same signature.
65template <typename Impl>
66class EXPORT_TEMPLATE_DECLARE(V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE) TorqueGeneratedFactory {
67 private:
68 FactoryBase<Impl>* factory() { return static_cast<FactoryBase<Impl>*>(this); }
69
70 public:
71#include "torque-generated/factory.inc"
72};
73
74struct NewCodeOptions {
75 CodeKind kind;
76 Builtin builtin;
77 bool is_turbofanned;
78 int stack_slots;
79 uint16_t parameter_count;
80 int instruction_size;
81 int metadata_size;
82 unsigned int inlined_bytecode_size;
83 BytecodeOffset osr_offset;
84 int handler_table_offset;
85 int constant_pool_offset;
86 int code_comments_offset;
87 int32_t unwinding_info_offset;
88 MaybeHandle<TrustedObject> bytecode_or_interpreter_data;
89 MaybeHandle<DeoptimizationData> deoptimization_data;
90 MaybeHandle<TrustedByteArray> bytecode_offset_table;
91 MaybeHandle<TrustedByteArray> source_position_table;
92 // Either instruction_stream is set and instruction_start is kNullAddress, or
93 // instruction_stream is empty and instruction_start a valid target.
94 MaybeHandle<InstructionStream> instruction_stream;
95 Address instruction_start;
96};
97
98template <typename Impl>
99class FactoryBase : public TorqueGeneratedFactory<Impl> {
100 public:
101 Handle<Code> NewCode(const NewCodeOptions& options);
102
103 Handle<CodeWrapper> NewCodeWrapper();
104
105 // Converts the given boolean condition to JavaScript boolean value.
106 inline Handle<Boolean> ToBoolean(bool value);
107
108#define ROOT_ACCESSOR(Type, name, CamelName) inline Handle<Type> name();
109 READ_ONLY_ROOT_LIST(ROOT_ACCESSOR)
110 MUTABLE_ROOT_LIST(ROOT_ACCESSOR)
111#undef ROOT_ACCESSOR
112
113 // Numbers (e.g. literals) are pretenured by the parser.
114 // The return value may be a smi or a heap number.
115 template <AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung>
116 inline Handle<Object> NewNumber(double value);
117 template <AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung>
118 inline Handle<Object> NewNumberFromInt(int32_t value);
119 template <AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung>
120 inline Handle<Object> NewNumberFromUint(uint32_t value);
121 template <AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung>
122 inline Handle<Object> NewNumberFromSize(size_t value);
123 template <AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung>
124 inline Handle<Object> NewNumberFromInt64(int64_t value);
125 template <AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung>
126 inline Handle<HeapNumber> NewHeapNumber(double value);
127 template <AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung>
128 inline Handle<HeapNumber> NewHeapNumberFromBits(uint64_t bits);
129 template <AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung>
130 inline Handle<HeapNumber> NewHeapNumberWithHoleNaN();
131
132 template <AllocationType allocation>
133 Handle<HeapNumber> NewHeapNumber();
134
135 Handle<Struct> NewStruct(InstanceType type,
136 AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
137
138 // Create a pre-tenured empty AccessorPair.
139 Handle<AccessorPair> NewAccessorPair();
140
141 // Allocates a fixed array initialized with undefined values.
142 Handle<FixedArray> NewFixedArray(
143 int length, AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
144
145 // Allocates a trusted fixed array in trusted space, initialized with zeros.
146 Handle<TrustedFixedArray> NewTrustedFixedArray(int length);
147
148 // Allocates a protected fixed array in trusted space, initialized with zeros.
149 Handle<ProtectedFixedArray> NewProtectedFixedArray(int length);
150
151 // Allocates a fixed array-like object with given map and initialized with
152 // undefined values.
153 Handle<FixedArray> NewFixedArrayWithMap(
154 DirectHandle<Map> map, int length,
155 AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
156
157 // Allocate a new fixed array with non-existing entries (the hole).
158 Handle<FixedArray> NewFixedArrayWithHoles(
159 int length, AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
160
161 // Allocate a new fixed array with Tagged<Smi>(0) entries.
162 Handle<FixedArray> NewFixedArrayWithZeroes(
163 int length, AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
164
165 // Allocate a new uninitialized fixed double array.
166 // The function returns a pre-allocated empty fixed array for length = 0,
167 // so the return type must be the general fixed array class.
168 Handle<FixedArrayBase> NewFixedDoubleArray(
169 int length, AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
170
171 // Allocates a weak fixed array-like object with given map and initialized
172 // with undefined values. Length must be > 0.
173 Handle<WeakFixedArray> NewWeakFixedArrayWithMap(
174 Tagged<Map> map, int length,
175 AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
176
177 // Allocates a fixed array which may contain in-place weak references. The
178 // array is initialized with undefined values
179 // The function returns a pre-allocated empty weak fixed array for length = 0.
180 Handle<WeakFixedArray> NewWeakFixedArray(
181 int length, AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
182
183 // Allocates a trusted weak fixed array in trusted space, initialized with
184 // zeros.
185 Handle<TrustedWeakFixedArray> NewTrustedWeakFixedArray(int length);
186
187 // The function returns a pre-allocated empty byte array for length = 0.
188 Handle<ByteArray> NewByteArray(
189 int length, AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
190
191 // Allocates a trusted byte array in trusted space, initialized with zeros.
192 Handle<TrustedByteArray> NewTrustedByteArray(int length);
193
194 Handle<ExternalPointerArray> NewExternalPointerArray(
195 int length, AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
196
197 Handle<DeoptimizationLiteralArray> NewDeoptimizationLiteralArray(int length);
198 Handle<DeoptimizationFrameTranslation> NewDeoptimizationFrameTranslation(
199 int length);
200
201 Handle<BytecodeArray> NewBytecodeArray(
202 int length, const uint8_t* raw_bytecodes, int frame_size,
203 uint16_t parameter_count, DirectHandle<TrustedFixedArray> constant_pool,
204 DirectHandle<TrustedByteArray> handler_table);
205
206 Handle<BytecodeWrapper> NewBytecodeWrapper();
207
208#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
209 Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData> NewWasmTrustedInstanceData();
210 Handle<WasmDispatchTable> NewWasmDispatchTable(int length);
211#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
212
213 // Allocates a fixed array for name-value pairs of boilerplate properties and
214 // calculates the number of properties we need to store in the backing store.
215 Handle<ObjectBoilerplateDescription> NewObjectBoilerplateDescription(
216 int boilerplate, int all_properties, int index_keys, bool has_seen_proto);
217
218 // Create a new ArrayBoilerplateDescription struct.
219 Handle<ArrayBoilerplateDescription> NewArrayBoilerplateDescription(
220 ElementsKind elements_kind, DirectHandle<FixedArrayBase> constant_values);
221
222 Handle<RegExpBoilerplateDescription> NewRegExpBoilerplateDescription(
223 DirectHandle<FixedArray> data, DirectHandle<String> source,
224 Tagged<Smi> flags);
225
226 // Create a new TemplateObjectDescription struct.
227 Handle<TemplateObjectDescription> NewTemplateObjectDescription(
228 DirectHandle<FixedArray> raw_strings,
229 DirectHandle<FixedArray> cooked_strings);
230
231 Handle<Script> NewScript(
232 DirectHandle<PrimitiveHeapObject> source,
233 ScriptEventType event_type = ScriptEventType::kCreate);
234 Handle<Script> NewScriptWithId(
235 DirectHandle<PrimitiveHeapObject> source, int script_id,
236 ScriptEventType event_type = ScriptEventType::kCreate);
237
238 Handle<SloppyArgumentsElements> NewSloppyArgumentsElements(
239 int length, DirectHandle<Context> context,
240 DirectHandle<FixedArray> arguments,
241 AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
242 Handle<ArrayList> NewArrayList(
243 int size, AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
244
245 Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> NewSharedFunctionInfoForLiteral(
246 FunctionLiteral* literal, DirectHandle<Script> script, bool is_toplevel);
247
248 // Create a copy of a given SharedFunctionInfo for use as a placeholder in
249 // off-thread compilation
250 Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> CloneSharedFunctionInfo(
251 DirectHandle<SharedFunctionInfo> other);
252
253 Handle<SharedFunctionInfoWrapper> NewSharedFunctionInfoWrapper(
254 Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> sfi);
255
256 Handle<PreparseData> NewPreparseData(int data_length, int children_length);
257
258 Handle<UncompiledDataWithoutPreparseData>
259 NewUncompiledDataWithoutPreparseData(Handle<String> inferred_name,
260 int32_t start_position,
261 int32_t end_position);
262
263 Handle<UncompiledDataWithPreparseData> NewUncompiledDataWithPreparseData(
264 Handle<String> inferred_name, int32_t start_position,
265 int32_t end_position, Handle<PreparseData>);
266
267 Handle<UncompiledDataWithoutPreparseDataWithJob>
268 NewUncompiledDataWithoutPreparseDataWithJob(Handle<String> inferred_name,
269 int32_t start_position,
270 int32_t end_position);
271
272 Handle<UncompiledDataWithPreparseDataAndJob>
273 NewUncompiledDataWithPreparseDataAndJob(Handle<String> inferred_name,
274 int32_t start_position,
275 int32_t end_position,
276 Handle<PreparseData>);
277
278 // Allocates a FeedbackMetadata object and zeroes the data section.
279 Handle<FeedbackMetadata> NewFeedbackMetadata(
280 int slot_count, int create_closure_slot_count,
281 AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kOld);
282
283 Handle<CoverageInfo> NewCoverageInfo(const ZoneVector<SourceRange>& slots);
284
285 Handle<String> InternalizeString(base::Vector<const uint8_t> string,
286 bool convert_encoding = false);
287 Handle<String> InternalizeString(base::Vector<const uint16_t> string,
288 bool convert_encoding = false);
289
290 template <class StringTableKey>
291 Handle<String> InternalizeStringWithKey(StringTableKey* key);
292
293 Handle<SeqOneByteString> NewOneByteInternalizedString(
294 base::Vector<const uint8_t> str, uint32_t raw_hash_field);
295 Handle<SeqTwoByteString> NewTwoByteInternalizedString(
296 base::Vector<const base::uc16> str, uint32_t raw_hash_field);
297 Handle<SeqOneByteString> NewOneByteInternalizedStringFromTwoByte(
298 base::Vector<const base::uc16> str, uint32_t raw_hash_field);
299
300 Handle<SeqOneByteString> AllocateRawOneByteInternalizedString(
301 int length, uint32_t raw_hash_field);
302 Handle<SeqTwoByteString> AllocateRawTwoByteInternalizedString(
303 int length, uint32_t raw_hash_field);
304
305 // Creates a single character string where the character has given code.
306 // A cache is used for Latin1 codes.
307 Handle<String> LookupSingleCharacterStringFromCode(uint16_t code);
308
309 MaybeHandle<String> NewStringFromOneByte(
310 base::Vector<const uint8_t> string,
311 AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
312
313 inline Handle<String> NewStringFromAsciiChecked(
314 const char* str, AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung) {
315 return NewStringFromOneByte(base::OneByteVector(str), allocation)
316 .ToHandleChecked();
317 }
318
319 // Allocates and partially initializes an one-byte or two-byte String. The
320 // characters of the string are uninitialized. Currently used in regexp code
321 // only, where they are pretenured.
322 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT MaybeHandle<SeqOneByteString> NewRawOneByteString(
323 int length, AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
324 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT MaybeHandle<SeqTwoByteString> NewRawTwoByteString(
325 int length, AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
326 // Create a new cons string object which consists of a pair of strings.
327 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT MaybeHandle<String> NewConsString(
328 Handle<String> left, Handle<String> right,
329 AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
330
331 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT Handle<String> NewConsString(
332 DirectHandle<String> left, DirectHandle<String> right, int length,
333 bool one_byte, AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
334
335 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT Handle<String> NumberToString(
336 DirectHandle<Object> number,
337 NumberCacheMode mode = NumberCacheMode::kBoth);
338 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT Handle<String> HeapNumberToString(
339 DirectHandle<HeapNumber> number, double value,
340 NumberCacheMode mode = NumberCacheMode::kBoth);
341 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT Handle<String> SmiToString(
342 Tagged<Smi> number, NumberCacheMode mode = NumberCacheMode::kBoth);
343
344 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT MaybeHandle<SeqOneByteString> NewRawSharedOneByteString(
345 int length);
346 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT MaybeHandle<SeqTwoByteString> NewRawSharedTwoByteString(
347 int length);
348
349 // Allocates a new BigInt with {length} digits. Only to be used by
350 // MutableBigInt::New*.
351 Handle<FreshlyAllocatedBigInt> NewBigInt(
352 int length, AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
353
354 // Create a serialized scope info.
355 Handle<ScopeInfo> NewScopeInfo(int length,
356 AllocationType type = AllocationType::kOld);
357
358 Handle<SourceTextModuleInfo> NewSourceTextModuleInfo();
359
360 Handle<DescriptorArray> NewDescriptorArray(
361 int number_of_descriptors, int slack = 0,
362 AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
363
364 Handle<ClassPositions> NewClassPositions(int start, int end);
365
366 Handle<SwissNameDictionary> NewSwissNameDictionary(
367 int at_least_space_for = kSwissNameDictionaryInitialCapacity,
368 AllocationType allocation = AllocationType::kYoung);
369
370 Handle<SwissNameDictionary> NewSwissNameDictionaryWithCapacity(
371 int capacity, AllocationType allocation);
372
373 Handle<FunctionTemplateRareData> NewFunctionTemplateRareData();
374
375 MaybeDirectHandle<Map> GetInPlaceInternalizedStringMap(
376 Tagged<Map> from_string_map);
377
378 AllocationType RefineAllocationTypeForInPlaceInternalizableString(
379 AllocationType allocation, Tagged<Map> string_map);
380
381 protected:
382 // Must be large enough to fit any double, int, or size_t.
383 static constexpr int kNumberToStringBufferSize = 32;
384
385 // Allocate memory for an uninitialized array (e.g., a FixedArray or similar).
386 Tagged<HeapObject> AllocateRawArray(int size, AllocationType allocation);
387 Tagged<HeapObject> AllocateRawFixedArray(int length,
388 AllocationType allocation);
389 Tagged<HeapObject> AllocateRawWeakArrayList(int length,
390 AllocationType allocation);
391
392 template <typename StructType>
393 inline Tagged<StructType> NewStructInternal(InstanceType type,
394 AllocationType allocation);
395 Tagged<Struct> NewStructInternal(ReadOnlyRoots roots, Tagged<Map> map,
396 int size, AllocationType allocation);
397
398 Tagged<HeapObject> AllocateRawWithImmortalMap(
399 int size, AllocationType allocation, Tagged<Map> map,
400 AllocationAlignment alignment = kTaggedAligned);
401 Tagged<HeapObject> NewWithImmortalMap(Tagged<Map> map,
402 AllocationType allocation);
403
404 Handle<FixedArray> NewFixedArrayWithFiller(DirectHandle<Map> map, int length,
405 DirectHandle<HeapObject> filler,
406 AllocationType allocation);
407
408 Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> NewSharedFunctionInfo(AllocationType allocation);
409 Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> NewSharedFunctionInfo(
410 MaybeDirectHandle<String> maybe_name,
411 MaybeDirectHandle<HeapObject> maybe_function_data, Builtin builtin,
412 FunctionKind kind = FunctionKind::kNormalFunction);
413
414 Handle<String> MakeOrFindTwoCharacterString(uint16_t c1, uint16_t c2);
415
416 template <typename SeqStringT>
417 MaybeHandle<SeqStringT> NewRawStringWithMap(int length, Tagged<Map> map,
418 AllocationType allocation);
419
420 private:
421 Impl* impl() { return static_cast<Impl*>(this); }
422 auto isolate() { return impl()->isolate(); }
423 ReadOnlyRoots read_only_roots() { return impl()->read_only_roots(); }
424
425 Tagged<HeapObject> AllocateRaw(
426 int size, AllocationType allocation,
427 AllocationAlignment alignment = kTaggedAligned);
428
429 friend TorqueGeneratedFactory<Impl>;
430 template <class Derived, class Shape, class Super>
431 friend class TaggedArrayBase;
432 template <class Derived, class Shape, class Super>
433 friend class PrimitiveArrayBase;
434};
435
436extern template class EXPORT_TEMPLATE_DECLARE(V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE)
437 FactoryBase<Factory>;
438extern template class EXPORT_TEMPLATE_DECLARE(V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE)
439 FactoryBase<LocalFactory>;
440
441} // namespace internal
442} // namespace v8
